ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Sticker shock!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Okay, weird, I am now seeing the AC for the lizard scale cloak listed as 8 on two sites...at any rate, it IS cheaper...I will have to get my last 5 dex to
ygData.messageBody:
>
> the only thing i can think of is that they are used for the wizard's
> runescale cloak quest from the temple of sol ro. when that
> quest started
> was when i saw the price jump. personally, i would go with a
> cloak of the
> icebear, it is more AC and has HP which never hurts. not
> remarkable, and
> arguably not better, but considering it is less expensive you
> can argue for
> the icebear. before i got my HBC i did switch out the
> lizardscale for an
> icebear. even though only 1 AC my total went up 3 points.


Okay, weird, I am now seeing the AC for the lizard scale cloak listed as 8
on two sites...at any rate, it IS cheaper...I will have to get my last 5 dex
to 100 some ohter way...


Tszaaz
